text: It was great catching up with you my friend.
Had an amazing time, thank you for all you do to fight for your community

Je comprends votre douleur et les injustices que vous avez subies je suis avec vous dans votre qu te de justice. L'un des premiers pas sur la voie de la justice est la reconnaissance du g nocide perp tr par le Sri Lanka contre le peuple tamoul.

Je me souviens du Juillet noir. 37 ans apr s que des repr sentants de l' tat sri lankais ont pris pour cible les Tamouls par des actes de violence g nocidaire. 37 ans de r silience d montr e par les survivant es.

I understand your pain and the injustices you have endured I stand with you in your pursuit of justice. One of the first steps on the path to justice is acknowledging the genocide perpetrated by Sri Lanka against the Tamil people.
I remember Black July. 37 years since Sri Lankan state officials targeted Tamil with acts of genocidal violence. 37 years of resilience exhibited by survivors.

chaque tape, les lib raux ont essay de faire le moins possible. Nous les avons pouss s chaque tape en faire plus pour les gens. Et nous ne nous arr terons pas. Nous continuerons forcer les lib raux faire ce qu il faut afin que personne ne soit laiss pour compte.

At every step of the way, the Liberal government tried to do the least possible. We ve pushed them every step of the way to do more for people. And we won t stop. We'll keep forcing the Liberals to do what's right for families so that no one is left behind.

Des gens comme la mairesse Toni Boot sont une source d'inspiration a pris position pour refuser la haine et au racisme tout espace dans sa communaut Construire un monde sans haine signifie que nous devons le remettre en question chaque fois qu'il se pr sente
People like Mayor Toni Boot are an inspiration took a stand to deny hate and racism any space in her community Building a world free from hate means we must challenge it every time it rears its head

Jesse, you did a courageous thing helping to bring the people responsible for killing my uncle to justice. My family is eternally grateful. Sharing your story was also an act of courage. Thank you for sharing it with us all.
Quand vous voyez quelque chose qui n'est pas correct, pas quitable, pas juste, vous devez le dire. Vous devez dire quelque chose vous devez faire quelque chose. John Lewis Reposer au pouvoir
When you see something that is not right, not fair, not just, you have to speak up. You have to say something you have to do something. John Lewis Rest in Power

Fier de la position du premier ministre sur la d criminalisation des drogues usage personnel. Les personnes arr t es pour usage personnel sont souvent confront es des difficult s mentales, la pauvret et ou la toxicomanie.

Proud of Premier stand on decriminalization of drugs for personal use. People arrested for personal use are often facing mental challenges, poverty and or addiction. They need health care and social work, not criminal charges and jail time.

tudiant es, je veux vous entendre M. Trudeau a donn pr s d un milliard ses ami es d UNIS Et l , il fait l objet d une enqu te Je veux vous entendre directement Comment 900 millions pourraient tre utilis s pour mieux vous aider

Students, I need your help Justin Trudeau moved quickly to give almost a billion dollars to his well connected friends at WE Now, he is under investigation I want to hear directly from you How could 900 million be used to better help you

C est de plus en plus clair que l'objectif du Premier ministre Trudeau n'a jamais t d'aider les tudiantes et les tudiants. D s le d but, ce programme semble avoir t pr cis ment con u pour aider les amis de M. Trudeau.
It s more and more clear that Prime Minister Trudeau s goal was never about helping students. From the beginning, this program seems to have been precisely designed to help Mr. Trudeau's friends.

When people need help they re told to wait But when friends of the PM need help, he jumps to give them a nearly billion dollar bailout The PM needs to admit that giving money to WE was never about help for students, but about help for his well connected friends

Quand les gens ont besoin d'aide, on leur dit d'attendre Mais lorsque des amis du PM ont besoin d'aide, il leur accorde un contrat de pr s d'un milliard de Le PM doit admettre que le scandale UNIS n'est pas pour aider les tudiants es, mais pour aider pour ses amis riches

Saddened that another family must endure the pain of racism in their own community. But it is responses like these, where a town rallies to say that hate has no place here, that gives us all hope. Together we must make sure hate has no space to take hold and no air to breathe.
